body.p:
Rochester Butler Co Ky Feb 26th/61
To the Hon..
Governor of Ky.

Dear Sir by the request of Mrs Phillips I would ask you to give her the request she asks you for that is to take into consideration ^her^ Situation. She is living on the Charity of her friends, hopeing you will release her husband from your prison.

Sir in a conversation with you at the Gault Hous in Louisville you Stated that you intened to releas him so that he Should not be disfranchised, and I do hope you will. If you could with propriety let him out in a few days I do assure you it would be a great Joy to her, as I know she is a feeling & Effectionate wife. I could Say more but it is unnesssary only hopeing you will Comply with the wishes of her & friends

Very respectfully your Obt Servant
John Downing Senr
Phillips Case
